title: Wholemeal sweet potato bread
ingredients: ['1 sweet potato', '200g sifted wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 pinch ground ginger', '300ml apple sauce', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons maple syrup or honey', '40g chopped walnuts (optional)']
